name: PlasmaBallScreensaver
0:
”Alexa, open plasma ball”
”Alexa, begin plasma ball”
”Alexa, start plasma ball”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: plasma ball
des:
Give your Echo the appearance of a Plasma Ball with this atmospheric screen saver! Perfect for mad scientists or those who want a mesmerizing static electricity display on their device. 

Designed for devices with a screen, and looks particularly effective on the round Echo Spot screen!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
